name: Guppy
description:
Guppy is a 2D watercolor fish simulation.

The game tries to replicate the movement of fish: alternate moving your tail left and right to propel yourself through the water. Hide in the shade of waterlilies and venture carefully into the open in search of food. Try not to get eaten.


FEATURES:

- swim like a fish!

- procedural levels

- watercolors

NOTE: The game is designed to be played in a window. It CAN be played fullscreen but does NOT support higher resolutions (max 480p).
